pwiz::msdata::CVParam::IsChildOf

pwiz::msdata::CVParam::IsChildOf Struct Reference

#include <CVParam.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

functor for finding children of a specified CVID in a collection of CVParams:

vector<CVParam>::const_iterator it = find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParam::IsChildOf(MS_software));
